text: If thy brother, the son of thy mother, or thy son, or daughter, or thy wife, that is in thy bosom, or thy friend, whom thou lovest as thy own soul, would persuade thee secretly, saying, Let us go, and serve strange gods, which thou knowest not, nor thy fathers.

segments.text: If thy brother, the son of thy mother, or thy son, or daughter, or thy wife, that is
in thy bosom, or thy friend, whom thou lovest as thy own soul, would persuade thee secretly,
saying, Let us go, and serve strange gods, which thou knowest not, nor thy fathers.
